name: Firebreak Pauldrons
description:
"Keeps the soot off."
—Vigil Tactician Blazefur

name: Bard's Valley Leather Leggings
description:
"Until we're able to get through the Nightmare Court, we have extra supplies."
—Explorer Pentt

name: Rescuer's Pauldrons
description:
"These won't rescue you from the Risen, but they will offer you some extra protection."
—Danu

name: Leather Aquabreather
description:
"Quaggan found this in a shipwreck underwater. Quaggan doesn't need it. OoOOoo! It's very nice, though!"
—Leemoola

description:
